text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One evening, T.M. Opera O and I are<n>walking
around the shopping district...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡Ah, Entrenador! Mira adelante. Una multitud<n>se ha reunido...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Do you think it's a duel? If so, I must<n>intercede.
Or perhaps—should I enter<n>the fray?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We go and take a look. Just as I<n>thought, there's
no duel going on.

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
Step right up and try your luck with our<n>New
Year's raffle! This year's grand-prize<n>is a hot
spring vacation for two!

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
First-prize winners get a deluxe carrot<n>hamburger
steak! Second-prize winners<n>get a bushel of
carrots! And third-prize<n>winners can take home a
single carrot!

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
How about you? The prima donna over<n>there!
Care to try your luck?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha! I suppose I have no choice<n>now that
I've been singled out among<n>the audience.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A raffle is it? How amusing. I'm<n>absolutely
fascinated with this spinning<n>gadget you have
here.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, pluck that ticket from your<n>breast
pocket. And obviously, only use<n>your index and
middle fingers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's always a performance, even in the<n>way one
pulls something from a pocket...<n>I take out the
ticket as she asks and give<n>it to the clerk.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Time to start the show, Trainer. Take<n>hold of the
gadget's lever with me.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
For the moment of truth! Spin, O gears<n>of fate!
Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Both of us raise one hand to the sky and<n>turn the
raffle spinner with the other.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A small plastic ball drops from the<n>spinner's
opening...

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
Holy mackerel! We've got ourselves a<n>grand-prize
winner! Come and get the<n>coupon for your hot
spring vacation!<n>Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Obtuviste:<n><itemname>

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡Oooh! ¡Es un rayo de luz de los<n>cielos!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The grand-prize! Indeed, even the<n>Goddess of
Luck is enamored with the<n>star that I am.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaah ha ha! Aaah ha ha haaa!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A hot spring vacation? How delightful. I<n>would
dare depart this instant, if only I<n>could.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But, alas, it's not in the cards while I still<n>walk the
Overlord's path.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yes. As I traverse this path, I should<n>entertain no
other.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If only the hot spring would come to me!<n>Should it
not rush to my feet the<n>moment I beckon?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¿En verdad? Son sorprendentemente<n>poco acomodaticias.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Then nothing can be done. I'll entrust<n>you with
the ticket for now.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Close it with wax using the king's seal<n>and keep it
safe until the appropriate<n>time comes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And now the hot spring vacation ticket is<n>in my
possession.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, hehehe... Can you see it? Because<n>I most
definitely can!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
At the summit of the Overlord's path... is<n>a hot
spring! Flowing freely from the<n>very earth! Haaah
ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a hot spring vacation to look<n>forward to,
Opera O's motivation shoots<n>through the roof!

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
Looks like we have another first-prize<n>winner!
Congratulations! You get one<n>deluxe carrot
hamburger steak!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Obtuviste:<n><itemname>

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hah, first-prize!  Luck certainly loves me.<n>Even I, a
king of kings, am pleased by<n>this!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But wait! Could it be?! The holy sword<n>before us is
none other than...<n>Excaliburger!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Behold! A single carrot stands plunged<n>into the
stone of minced meat!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Only one worthy to rule is capable of<n>withdrawing
it.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Which means I have not a moment to<n>lose. We
must make haste to the<n>kitchen!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡Estoy preparado! ¿Estás listo, Entrenador?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Once I draw the carrot, you are to say<n>the words
of revelation. Understood?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Listo... ¡Pop!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡He aquí mi gloria! ¡Haaah ha ha! Munch,munch...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This holy sword... is delicious! Truly a<n>treat for the
royal taste buds!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opera O devours Excaliburger, content<n>with both
the flavor and how much fun it<n>is to eat.

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
We got a second-prize winner! It's your<n>lucky day!
You're going home with a<n>bushel of carrots!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Obtuviste:<n><itemname>

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hmn, second-prize. I typically fare<n>better than
this. And yet...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Look at them all! With a little love from<n>me, they
would make great appreciation<n>gifts for my
adorning fans.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, perfect! Young boy over there, I<n>bestow unto
thee a carrot.

text_block_list.name: Chico
text_block_list.text: Puaj... Quédate con ella. Odio las zanahorias.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha! Whatever do you mean?<n>This is no
ordinary carrot, but a loving<n>gift from yours truly.

text_block_list.name: Chico
text_block_list.text: Ahora realmente no la quiero...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡C-chico joven! ¡Espera!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
How could this be? Ah! I see now. One<n>taste of
this carrot and all other foods<n>would be rendered
unpalatable.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ahh! I cannot hold out any longer!<n>Trainer, we
must eat all the carrots<n>ourselves.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
A ballet of carrots, je t'aime! We shall all<n>dance
the dance of carrots together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We eat the carrots while performing<n>some weird
choreography. The taste is<n>nothing to write home
about, but they're<n>good all the same.

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
Would you lookie here! You've won the<n>
third-prize! Here's your carrot!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Obtuviste:<n><itemname>

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What? A single carrot?! How dare you<n>insult
royalty!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¿Qué tienes que decir por ti misma,<n>zanahoria?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She vents her anger to the carrot. Of<n>course, it
has no response.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I have no other choice than to sing a<n>ballad of
sorrow, repurposing the carrot<n>as a microphone.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
It's times like this that make you sulk in<n>your
sorrows, don a different mantel,<n>and sing the
blues. Hit it, band!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, yes! Uh-huh! Mhmmm!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Welcooome to the carrot kingdooom!<n>You
carotene soldier, un deux trois!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opera O sings with desperation, but the<n>kids
around the shops seem to like her<n>song.

text_block_list.name: Empleado de la Rifa
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh, tough luck! Looks like you pulled<n>a blank
one! Take this pack of tissues as<n>a consolation
prize.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Obtuviste:<n><itemname>

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, woe... Worse has come to worst. The<n>great
me... recipient of a consolation<n>prize?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
To think I would receive nothing more<n>than a
mere packet of tissue paper...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Notice how I say "tissue paper" and notsimply "tissue." The former has a morebeautiful ring to it.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ¡Entrenador! ¡Emito un decreto real!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Take this packet of tissue paper and<n>exchange it
for a hot spring vacation<n>ticket!
choice_data_list: No hay manera de que acepten eso...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I will not hear your whining. Tragedy has<n>befallen
me, and I have become the mad<n>king, the Raving
Lord!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If you fail, I will confine you to<n>imprisonment in la
Conciergerie!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A bad luck of the draw has changed the<n>king. It
doesn't seem like anything is<n>going to improve
her mood.
